original_text: Then Manoah took a young goat, together with the grain offering, and sacrificed it on a rock to the Lord. And the Lord did an amazing thing while Manoah and his wife watched:
korean_text: 이에 마노아가 염소 새끼와 소제물을 가져다가 바위 위에서 여호와께 드리매 이적이 일어난지라 마노아와 그의 아내가 본즉

sentences.original_text: Then Manoah took a young goat
and sacrificed it on a rock to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 바위 위에서 주께 제물로 드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: And the Lord did an amazing thing
while Manoah and his wife watched
